articles.description: Shiny arena pop is out and classic rock is in for the quintessential band of the Myspace era. The result is weird, nostalgic and refreshing
articles.content: Panic! At The Disco exploded onto the scene in 2005 with their debut album A Fever You Cant Sweat Out. Smashing together emo with Vaudeville theatrics, they were the quintessential Myspace group, lea… [+2376 chars]

articles.author: Steve Greene
articles.title: ‘Better Call Saul’ Found the Perfect Way to Make ‘Breaking Bad’ Part of Its Goodbye - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: The show was always about a battle between past and future, something that let it embrace its predecessor without being defined by it.
articles.content: “Better Call Saul” had all the means to relitigate “Breaking Bad.” There was a courtroom and witnesses and the eager attention of every viewer keen on seeing where Saul Goodman’s (Bob Odenkirk) fate … [+7580 chars]
